meanings.sent1: The long hike was fatiguing for the young children.
meanings.sent2: After a day of hard work, she felt fatiguing exhaustion.
meanings.sent3: The cat found it fatiguing to chase after the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The never-ending meetings were a fatiguing marathon of boredom.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive tasks became increasingly fatiguing as the day went on.

meanings.sent1: The fatiguing workout left her muscles sore the next day.
meanings.sent2: He found the manual labor to be fatiguing but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The fatiguing journey up the mountain was worth it for the breathtaking view.
meanings.sent4: The constant noise of the city was a fatiguing assault on his senses.
meanings.sent5: The emotional toll of the situation was fatiguing for everyone involved.
